metadata.title: CVE-2018-18347 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect handling of failed navigations with invalid URLs in Navigation inGoogle Chrome prior to 71.0.3578.80 allowed a remote attacker to trick auser into executing javascript in an arbitrary origin via a crafted HTMLpage.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
